attributes.action: Make animal abuse the same sentence as if it was child/person
attributes.additional_details:
A animal suffers in the same way we do..  there bones break and hurt just like ours do...
They have feelings also
A heart also 

Animal abuse won't stop till they know uts a long jail sentence
attributes.background:
I want the law to change so that if a dog is hit, killed abused they person that's the same sentence as if they hit a child.. 

A ban does nothing.. just because they can own an animal don't stop family members/friends/partners dogs getting hurt

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565404
